page.title: 10RAILWAYS IN NEW MILLS/DISLEY
page.content: Railways were important in this area and quite a lot of streets have names which show their associations with railways. It carried a lot of goods including coal and other minerals and there used to be in existance a number of railway companies in New Mills. All the lines begin at Manchester Piccadily.The Newtown line goes to Buxton and the New Mills Central line travels to Sheffield.The railways today are mainly used to carry hikers to the Peak District,train spotting and commutting to cities for work. From where ever you live in the area you can see the rusty lines and the noise of trains wake people up.The track is an endless ladder winding through the valleys linking us to other places.By Daniel Jones.
